item.description:
Ring OUT the holiday with the Ring's!

Our biggest bash of the year is our annual holiday party at Linda and Ralph's home in Middletown. We share a great potluck dinner, play Christmas trivia, and hold our traditional "Yankee Swap."

Please plan to join us 7:00 and remember, the house will STILL be dressed for the holiday, so should you!

Remember to:
--RSVP (and then we'll send the directions)
--Bring a dish to share (please call to coordinate with the cook)
--Bring a gift for the Yankee Swap (value $15)
--Bring the $5 admission for members of Hartford Heights Tall Club ($10 for guests, former members, prospective members)
--Wear your holiday spirit!
item.name: Post-Holiday Holiday Party
